bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Wilson D. Coyle. Affidavit for Witnesses

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: In the District Court of the 4th Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding terms at Cheney for the Counties of Spokane, Lincoln, and Douglas.

Wilson D. Coyle being duly sworn says I am the defendant in the above entitled action wherein I am charged with assault with a deadly weapon, and that the following witnesses as necessary and mutual witnesses in my defense on said action to wit: Elias Messinger Clias Buell - BusllSdae Messinger Eli Wauch Joseph Hill John Lunf, Edward Liles. Thos. Burnett H. Hinckley, James Chivston Mel Calf Harold Thompson. Wherefore affiant asks that subpoena was may issue for said witnesses at the expense of the Territory of Washington Wilson D. Coyle
Sworn to and subscribed before me this 29th day of April A.D> 1885
In Dist. Court of the 4th Judicial District of Wash. Ter. holding terms at Cheney W.T.
Territory of Washington vs. Wilson D. Coyle
Indictment for assault with deadly weapon
Affidavit of defendant for subpoenas for witnesses
Issued subpoena for within witnesses Apr. 29, 1885
Filed April 29-85 Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk
